title: Is there a means of copying settings/bindings from one account to another?
body: I noticed a while ago one of the patches defaulted the bindings and settings one of my alt. accounts (that I use to play with lower level friends) but in the new menus I can't rebind some of the things I'm used to. Like I can't rebind attack move to left click for example.

replies.body:
The attack move option came out in a recent patch, and can be enabled in your bindings option.  There is method of copying settings, but they are all saved on our server side now.  Meaning, adjusting them once should save it permanently.

If your bindings are not saving or working though, then the settings could be corrupt.  In that case a config reset should fix it:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
